member_code AS "memberCode", rela_per_name AS "relaPerName", rela_per_gender_name AS "relaPerGenderName", rela_per_birthday AS "relaPerBirthday", rela_per_certificate_type AS "relaPerCertificateType", rela_per_certificate_name AS "relaPerCertificateName", rela_per_certificate_no AS "relaPerCertificateNo", rela_per_mobile_phone AS "relaPerMobilePhone", create_time AS "createTime"

SELECT SUM(ogl1.goods_discount_price * ogl1.goods_uint_num) AS "monetary" FROM order_info o1
WHERE ogl1.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND o1.pay_per_code = #{memberCode}

SELECT
member_code AS "memberCode", rela_per_name AS "relaPerName", rela_per_gender_name AS "relaPerGenderName", rela_per_birthday AS "relaPerBirthday", rela_per_certificate_type AS "relaPerCertificateType", rela_per_certificate_name AS "relaPerCertificateName", rela_per_certificate_no AS "relaPerCertificateNo", rela_per_mobile_phone AS "mobilePhone", create_time AS "createTime" FROM member_relationship_info
del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and member_code=rela_per_code
AND rela_per_name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND rela_per_mobile_phone LIKE '%'||#{relaPerMobilePhone}||'%' '%'+#{relaPerMobilePhone}+'%' concat('%',#{relaPerMobilePhone},'%')
AND create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
AND member_code = #{memberCode}
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY update_time DESC
